list.abs: 同母异父的大姊辍学耽溺在游牧空间（nomadic space），跟著卖画的男人私奔，有时也带著作者跑遍了大半个台湾，过著游牧生活， …
noise trouble 噪音公害nomadic herd 迁移兽群nomadism 漫游
游牧业(nomadic herding)是指靠放牧牲畜为生的一种自给性农业。这种生产方式适于难以进行定居农业的干旱气候地区。虽然现在从事游牧的人数在世界上并不多,据估计,只有.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French nomade, via Latin from Greek nomas, nomad- 'roaming in search of pasture', from the base of nemein 'to pasture'

entry.def: A nomad is a member of a group of people who travel from place to place rather than living in one place all the time.

example.ex: ...a country of nomads who raise cattle and camels.
example.tran: 饲养牛和骆驼的游牧国度

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a people who have no permanent home but move about according to the seasons
